org.rapla.mobile.android.widget

Class DatePickerSpinner

  • java.lang.Object
    • Spinner
      • org.rapla.mobile.android.widget.DatePickerSpinner

  • public class DatePickerSpinner
extends Spinner
    This widget combines a spinner widget with a date picker dialog. Clicking the spinner widget opens the date picker dialog for selecting a date. Pressing ok on the dialog puts the selected date into the spinner widget as selected value.
    Author:
    Maximilian Lenkeit

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DatePickerSpinner.DatePickerOnDateSetListener
      This listener listens to the save button of the date picker dialog and refreshes the spinner with the selected date.
      static class  DatePickerSpinner.SpinnerOnTouchListener
      This listener listens to touch events on the spinner widget and displays the date picker dialog.
